title:
# Frontend Development Fundamentals
## HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Basics

questions.question:
# HTML Accessibility Look at this HTML code snippet: ```html My First Page

Welcome!

This is my website.

Learn More
``` Identify three accessibility issues in this code and explain how to fix them. Consider image attributes, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation, and color contrast.

# Responsive Web Design

Responsive design is critical for modern websites. Look at this image showing different devices:

![Responsive Design](https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*2TUKm12i_YGiIlMbulX7Ow.jpeg)

1. Explain the concept of "mobile-first" design and why it's important
2. Write a CSS media query that applies styles only for screens between 768px and 1024px wide
3. Describe three responsive design techniques beyond media queries
4. How would you handle high-resolution images for different device resolutions?
